text:
Keisha Lance Bottoms (born January 18, 1970) is an American politician and lawyer. She is the 60th and current Mayor of Atlanta, Georgia.
She was elected as mayor in 2017, after receiving the most votes in the runoff election (50.4%).
In June 2020, Bottoms became one of the final four finalists for Joe Biden's running mate for the 2020 election.
In July 2020, she was diagnosed with COVID-19 despite not having any symptoms.
